section.p: You lose your way in the freezing tunnels, and wander for miles. Eventually, your light source burns out completely, and you are plunged into darkness.
A whistling wind springs up, and something rushes at you out of the blackness, howling like a banshee. You are struck senseless.
You come round on the shore of the lake, drained of your vital energy by some vampiric force. Reduce your Rank by one, and . The result is the number of Stamina points you lose, permanently. .
